decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing Raffine, Scheming Seer as the commander to create a high-powered aggro strategy in a Duel Commander 1 vs 1 format. The deck contains a mix of disruptive spells, efficient creatures, and strong removal options to control the board and pressure the opponent. With a strong mana base and a blend of card advantage and targeted disruption, the goal is to apply consistent pressure while disrupting the opponent's game plan. Key cards like Brainstorm, Force of Will, and True-Name Nemesis help to maintain tempo and protect the game plan, while cards like Fatal Push, Swords to Plowshares, and Thoughtseize provide answers to opposing threats. Overall, the deck aims to rapidly close out games through a combination of smart plays and efficient threats.

This deck focuses on utilizing a combination of aggressive creatures and powerful spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent and secure victory. It includes a mix of efficient removal spells and countermagic to disrupt the opponent's game plan while deploying threats like True-Name Nemesis, Questing Beast, and Urza, Lord High Artificer. The mana base is carefully constructed to ensure smooth mana production and access to a variety of colors. The inclusion of cards like Umezawa's Jitte and Shadowspear provides additional combat tricks and ways to deal with opposing threats. Overall, this deck aims to apply early pressure, maintain tempo, and close out the game swiftly through a combination of efficient creatures and versatile spells.

This deck revolves around using various combo pieces and disruption spells to create powerful synergies and control the game. It uses cards like Yawgmoth's Will, Underworld Breach, and Tainted Pact to dig for key combo pieces and recur spells from the graveyard. The deck also includes powerful disruption spells like Thoughtseize, Pyroblast, and Duress to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The commander, Flamewar, Brash Veteran, provides additional utility and support for the deck's strategy. Overall, the deck aims to assemble its combo pieces quickly while controlling the game with disruption spells to outmaneuver the opponent and secure victory in a 1 vs 1 duel commander format.

The deck focuses on a fast-paced aggressive strategy, utilizing a mix of low-cost creatures with powerful abilities and burn spells to quickly chip away at the opponent's life total. Juri, Master of the Revue serves as the commander and provides additional value when sacrificing creatures. The deck includes a variety of creature sacrifice outlets like Goblin Bombardment and Carrion Feeder to synergize with cards like Gravecrawler and Bloodghast. This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with constant pressure, leveraging the graveyard as a resource and keeping the opponent on the back foot. Through sacrificing creatures, direct damage spells, and evasive creatures, the deck aims to close out the game swiftly before the opponent can stabilize.

This control deck centered around Atraxa, Grand Unifier aims to manipulate the battlefield and disrupt opponents while slowly building up advantage. With a mix of versatile counterspells, removal options, and powerful planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Teferi, Hero of Dominaria, the deck aims to control the pace of the game and outvalue opponents. The deck also includes a range of card draw and tutoring effects to ensure consistency in finding key pieces. With a mana base focused on producing the necessary colors to cast spells efficiently, this deck looks to grind out wins through attrition and resource management, ultimately establishing dominance over the opponent.
